content: the bramble basket is a beginner friendly hanging basket crochet pattern that anyone can make to help organize small winter gear display plants and store closet accessories this quick and easy palette cleanser project makes a great stocking stuffer gift or craft show product - you can whip up several over a weekend sizes one size finished measurements 8 wide by 12 tall yarn used in sample 230 yds of wecrochet billow yarn 100g 120yds in your choice of color suggested needles/hooks and notions l/8 0mm crochet hook scissors tapestry needle skills magic_ring single_crochet whip stitch ……………………………………………………………………………… the pdf is beautifully formatted for easy printing and downloading it includes a complete materials list abbreviations and stitch definitions pattern notes with additional resources written instructions pattern is available only in english ……………………………………………………………………………… making finished items you can sell finished products made from this pattern by giving credit to me as the designer and linking to the original blog post pattern please be respectful and do not sell or distribute this pattern in any way especially as your own instead share the original blog post link return policy there are no returns on digital files please contact me with any further questions thanks for browsing find me at website - www 1dogwoof com instagram - www instagram com/1dogwoof facebook - www facebook com/onedogwoof youtube - www youtube com/1dogwoof pinterest - www pinterest com/1dogwoof twitter - www twitter com/1dogwoof
